#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>




using namespace std;



#define TEST 0


class ProblemSolver {
	public:
		void solve(int testNum, istream &in, ostream &out) {
			long long int N;
			in >> N;
			long long int merges = 0LL;
			while (N > 1) {
				if (N % 2 == 0) {
					merges += N / 2;
					N /= 2;
				} else {
					merges += (N - 1) / 2;
					N = (N + 1) / 2;
				}
			}
			out << merges << "\n";
		}
};


int main() {
	#if TEST
		ifstream inputfile;
		inputfile.open("input.txt", ios::in);
		istream &in = inputfile;
		ostream &out = cout;
	#else
		istream &in = cin;
		ostream &out = cout;
	#endif
	ProblemSolver solver;
	int testCases;
	in >> testCases;
	for (int testNum = 1; testNum <= testCases; testNum += 1) {
		solver.solve(testNum, in, out);
	}
	return 0;
}
